song.title: Love Came Down
song.lyrics:
[1] . Dbmaj7 If my heart is overwhelmed . Fm Eb And I cannot hear Your voice . Dbmaj7 Ab Eb I'll hold on to what is true, though I cannot see || . Dbmaj7 If the storms of life they come . Fm Eb And the road ahead gets steep . Dbmaj7 Ab Eb I will lift these hands in faith, I will believe
[P] . Bbm7 Ab/F Eb I remind myself of all that You've done . Bbm7 Ab/F Db And the life I have because of Your Son
[C] .Ab Love came down and rescued me .Dbmaj7 Love came down and set me free .Fm Eb Db I am Yours, I am forever Yours || .Ab Mountain high or valley low .Dbmaj7 I sing out remind my soul .Fm Eb Db I am Yours, I am forever Yours --- [2] . Dbmaj7 When my heart is filled with hope . Fm Eb And every promise comes my way . Dbmaj7 Ab Eb When I feel Your hands of grace rest upon me || . Dbmaj7 Staying desperate for You God . Fm Eb Staying humbled at Your feet . Dbmaj7 Ab Eb/G I will lift these hands and praise I will believe
[B] . Ab/`E Dbmaj7 I am Yours, I am Yours . Fm Eb Db All my days, Jesus I am Yours
song.author: Brian Johnson
song.presentation: 1 P C 2 P C B C
